trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Riverton
There were no other sightings in Riverton on or around September 1st 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsgoing trough riverton wyo at around 4 am in morning looked up seen what i no was a ufo there is nothing on earth that looked like it i am only writeing this now because i seen something that might looked like what i seen on your show or a show about you what i seen was made up of a bunch of pink lights something like the kids play lights that are fiber optics the ones that look like a bunch of fish lines the light goes through and looks like a bunch of lights at the ends of the lines i watched this for about 5 min it was all over the space of about 10 miles and as close as 1 to 2 miles away then it was gone and i have never had a problem telling my friends what i have seen but untell i seen what could have been something close to what i seen on UFOs over earth show i never told anyone like you before but seeing what i did made me feel like i had to maybe back up someone else story or have something to back up mine
